snippet: Canadian Milos Raonic will not be the only man experiencing something new on Wimbledon's Centre Court on Sunday -- for the first time Britain's Andy Murray will start a grand slam final as favorite after crushing Tomas Berdych in the semis....
lead_paragraph: Canadian Milos Raonic will not be the only man experiencing something new on Wimbledon's Centre Court on Sunday -- for the first time Britain's Andy Murray will start a grand slam final as favorite after crushing Tomas Berdych in the semis.

headline.print_headline: Murray Favorite for Title as Usual Suspects Go Missing
headline.main: Murray Favorite for Title as Usual Suspects Go Missing
